title: IMDb TV has a new (but still terrible) name: Amazon Freevee
content:
Amazon has had its own free (ad-supported) streaming service for a few years now, called IMDb TV. Amazon also owns the Internet Movie Database (IMDb), so tying it in with a streaming service probably sounded like a good idea on paper, but in reality, there wasn’t much connecting the two. Now the streaming service has

The post IMDb TV has a new (but still terrible) name: Amazon Freevee appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Amazon's free streaming service, IMDb TV, has a new name. It's also expanding its library of original content.
